title: Wholphin DVD logotype?
content:
what might this be set in? thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020154656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wholphin_4600.header.gif)
author: 400Designers

comments.content: Nope. Don’t think so. It’s not Avenir either.
Looks like a squished Interstate Bold
yep, I've tried Avenir—thinking that was what it is—but its got some subtle differences. Avenir is definitely the closest I've been able to come. Hmmmm…any other ideas?
